events.message: I recently ordered a jacket but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The customer reported a return request due to sizing issues and requested a refund for the jacket purchase.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa H. for handling the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry the jacket didn’t fit. Let me assist you with your refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and whether the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
The order number is 789456123. The jacket is brand new, only tried on once, no damage at all.
Thank you for the info. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once we receive the item, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for the clear instructions and quick response. I appreciate your help and will ship the jacket today.
We have received your returned jacket and completed the refund. Please check your account for the refunded amount.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if you need anything else.
